title: Out of the Blue
description: TrentI never expected to see her again. I certainly never thought my record label would hire her to be my band’s social media manager.But now, here we are, on a tour that could make or break my career—me with a massively dark secret that could ruin everything, and her with enough emotional baggage to fill a stadium. I should leave her alone.Too bad I’ve never been good at doing what I should…Cordelia I’ve worked too hard, come too far, overcome too much, to get screwed over by something as frivolous and fleeting as love. So, I absolutely will not be giving in to my attraction to Trent.Well, not again, anyway. That anonymous one-night stand is all he’ll get out of me. My heart can never be part of the deal.No matter how much he makes me wish things could be different for us…Out of the Blue, book 4 in the The Hunte Family series, is an angsty, steamy, contemporary rock star romance that can be read as a standalone, and features a guaranteed happily ever after. This book is intended for readers who love strong, independent heroines and the brooding, sexy alpha males who capture their hearts. Download this enemies-to-lovers full-length novel today and let the binge reading begin.
author: Arell Rivers
